title: logfiles
author: logfiles
content: Account shapetwist woke up after a long hiatus and started making random IA generated image posts while advertising a shitcoin [ANN] $APX | AstroPepeX | 1st token fully created by AIProbably trying to trap newbies and guest users into buying his shitcoinThe person behind the account confessed to buying the account recentlyQuote from: shapetwist on September 28, 2023, 09:26:05 AMQuote from: logfiles on September 25, 2023, 11:50:26 PMQuote from: shapetwist on September 25, 2023, 08:22:48 PMStunna, I'm coming for you.A loan defaulter whose account just woke up today to post a bunch of useless AI generated images after a 6 year break?You must really be so deluded.Wake up idiot, I just bought the account.Account traders can not be trusted. The account also has a history of defaulting a loan, therefore this topic serves as a reference for a newbie/guest flag I am creating against the profile

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Someone help create a type one flag for this user using this topic as reference as share the link here. I already created one, but It had the wrong reference and I had to withdraw it. Unfortunately, I can't create a new one within 180 days.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on September 29, 2023, 12:03:19 AMSomeone help create a type one flag for this user using this topic as reference as share the link here. I already created one, but It had the wrong reference and I had to withdraw it. Unfortunately, I can't create a new one within 180 days.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3213üëç

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Luckily his shitcoin thread has no replies from anyone. For those logged in the forum the red tags are visible and for the unregistered the flag. I'm going to support it also to help prevent greater evils. Quote from: logfiles on September 29, 2023, 12:03:19 AMSomeone help create a type one flag for this user using this topic as reference as share the link here. I already created one, but It had the wrong reference and I had to withdraw it. Unfortunately, I can't create a new one within 180 days.Really? I have never heard of that. Time limitation for creating flags? For a Legendary member like you? I would understand if it was a newbie.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Don Pedro Dinero on September 30, 2023, 03:41:04 AMReally? I have never heard of that. Time limitation for creating flags? For a Legendary member like you? I would understand if it was a newbie.Yeah, there is a limitation for creating the same trust flag within 180 days regardless of one's rank. I think it was put in place to prevent some members from spamming profiles using trustflags like they did with trust feedback. You know how crazy some members can be.Thanks, @owlcatz.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I added a negative trust and supported the flag.It is strange for a person to buy an account with negative trust and there is no hope of repaying the debt, and I do not think that he will generate any income using that account. If he bought that account to bump ANN topic, it seems that the forum accounts are being sold at a cheap price.

comments.author: nutildah
comments.body: What an incredibly smart guy, buying a negative trusted account to pitch a new token.Quote from: shapetwist on September 29, 2023, 10:44:13 AMFuck off idiotWho is going to be the one to tell him he got ripped off?¬† Wonder what he's talking about in what appears to be a cryptic threat to Stunna.Quote from: Don Pedro Dinero on September 30, 2023, 03:41:04 AMLuckily his shitcoin thread has no replies from anyone.He really thought posting some AI-generated Space Pepes would do the trick, rather than boring stuff like, ya know, a link to the creator's homepage/twitter, a GitHub link, etc. I read about it for fun and it is an interesting angle - interesting enough in the World of Shittokens - but I'm gonna pass.
